fields.title: St Nicolas tournament final ranking
fields.excerpt: The 2019 Saint Nicolas tournament took place on Saturday at Boitsfort, and what an amazing tournament it was !
fields.body:
Thank you to all the teams, volunteers, referees and organizers for a great day, and thank you to Mother Nature who gave us sun and blue skies all day.

Here are the final rankings:

  1. Old Wesley (from Donnybrook Touch Rugby)
  2. Den Haag Touch Fluffy Dragons
  3. Exeter Touch Rugby - Eagle Owls
  4. Donnybrook Touch Rugby
  5. Boitsfort Rugby Club - BRC Touch
  6. Kituro Touch
  7. Eindhoven Touch - ET
  8. BBRFC-Celtic Touch
  9. XXX Amsterdam Touch
  10. Rhinos Rugby Oudenaarde vzw
  11. Excelium
  12. Touch Belgium Juniors

Congratulations to our MVPs of the tournament, Jules from Eindhoven and Clara from
BBRFC Celtic,

We will be posting some pictures from the tournament on the Facebook event soon, so keep an eye on there.

Congratulations to all players for some truly great matches !!

Thanks all for coming and see you all at our next tournament, the 2020 BMWI on the 23rd of May in Brussels

fields.title: MO and WO training camp weekend
fields.excerpt: This weekend our Women’s Open and Men’s Open national training squads went in Flanders for their First Camp Weekend leading to the 2020 European Touch Championships
fields.body:
This weekend our Women’s Open and Men’s Open national training squads went in Flanders for their First Camp Weekend leading to the 2020 European Touch Championships.

More than 20 women and 14 men were there for an intense weekend full of touch. On the menu we had: fitness, touch drills, matches, video analysis, team bonding and much more.

For this occasion, we were very luck to have two pitches available and a hostel right next to them for the Saturday evening, in addition Mother Nature was very kind to us and we had blue skies and sun all weekend long.

Touch Belgium would like to congratulate all the players that made it in the Training squads and thank the coaches, referees and Touch Belgium board members that organized an amazing weekend for everyone involved !!

Now time for a little bit of rest, and we’ll be back for some more Touch tournaments and National trainings very soon.
